Optimised email application for multiple accounts

"To give you the best phone performance, some applications have been disabled.
"Disabled apps will no longer be visible on the application screen."
Enable the apps that you still want to access from the application screen. Enabling apps may impact phone performance."

"Android 4.0 brings many new features to your phone. The new software includes a lot of upgrades and requires more from your smartphone. Phone performance has been optimised by disabling some applications.
Use the Performance assistant to enable and disable applications that may impact performance.
The Performance assistant is always accessible from the application screen."
